name: LaneChanger
description:
Dodge cars as you speed into oncoming traffic followed by the entire police Forces.

Try not to wreck your car as you live your joyride fantasies speeding along the Highway, collect nitro along the way to build your lead in order to not fall in the Hands of the Police while always keeping an eye on your fuel usage!

The game originated from a small game jam Born in the mind of a studand who never drove a car in his life and wanted to know what it might feel like so 3 People brave enugh to take on this challange joined in and helped make this game.

But how do you Play?
Imma tell ya A for a left and D for a right once ya ready just slam your space bar and race off beat your personal best or tell your friends and race them into the ground!
